inventory=[{"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 35}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}]

thought: I need to craft 3 acacia_planks and 1 stick. To do this, I first need to move one of the acacia_planks from slot 40 into the crafting grid. I chose slot 1 because it is the top left corner of the crafting grid, which will allow me to craft the acacia_planks and stick in the same crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
